016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.handlebars.providers;
017
018import com.github.jknack.handlebars.Context;
019import com.github.jknack.handlebars.Handlebars;
020import com.github.jknack.handlebars.Template;
021import jakarta.inject.Inject;
022import jakarta.ws.rs.Produces;
023import jakarta.ws.rs.WebApplicationException;
024import jakarta.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext;
025import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
026import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap;
027import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter;
028import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
029
030import java.io.IOException;
031import java.io.OutputStream;
032import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
033import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
034import java.lang.reflect.Type;
035import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
036
037@Provider
038@Produces(MediaType.TEXT_HTML)
039public class HandlebarsHtmlMessageBodyWriter
040    implements MessageBodyWriter<Context>
041{
042
043    private Handlebars handlebars;
044
045    jakarta.inject.Provider<ContainerRequestContext> requestContextProvider;
046
047    @Inject
048    public HandlebarsHtmlMessageBodyWriter(Handlebars handlebars,
049                                           jakarta.inject.Provider<ContainerRequestContext> requestContextProvider)
050    {
051        this.handlebars = handlebars;
052        this.requestContextProvider = requestContextProvider;
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public boolean isWriteable(Class<?> type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations, MediaType mediaType) {
057        return type == Context.class;
058    }
059
060    @Override
061    public void writeTo(Context context, Class<?> type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations, MediaType mediaType, MultivaluedMap<String, Object> httpHeaders, OutputStream entityStream) throws IOException, WebApplicationException {
062        String path = requestContextProvider.get().getUriInfo().getPath();
063        Template compile = handlebars.compile(path);
064        OutputStreamWriter writer = new OutputStreamWriter(entityStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
065        compile.apply(context, writer);
066        writer.close();
067    }
068}
